这篇分享很值得创作者收藏👇

a16z 大会，50 位顶级创作者总结了 7 个共识：

1️⃣ 建立私域（邮件/社区），别被算法绑架

2️⃣ 线上流量要转化为线下关系（Dinner、Meetup、活动）

3️⃣ 把广告打包卖：播客+简报+社交+活动 = 长期合作

4️⃣ 越细分的市场，越能变现（Niche is Rich）

5️⃣

尊敬的各位领导，亲爱的老师、同学们：

大家晚上好！

在这个金秋送爽，丹桂飘香的美好时节，我们欢聚一堂，共同庆祝中华民族的传统佳节——中秋节。

今晚，我站在这轮皎洁的明月之下，心潮澎湃，感慨万千，愿以一曲“月满中秋，情满人间”的颂歌，表达我们对家的思念，对国的热爱，对未来的憧憬...

Last time we checked, gum base is still made from Polyvinyl acetate, Polyethylene, Butyl rubber, etc.

Recent studies show these plastics & more depositing in decedent brain tissue...

There's a true need for natural gum bases again. https://t.co/idP7qjtpod

user.name: Archer
user.description: Archer’s mission is to unlock the skies, freeing us to reimagine how we live and spend time. (NYSE: $ACHR)

fullText: Osaka has named Japan Airlines (@JAL_Official_jp) & Sumitomo Corporation’s JV, Soracle (@SCL_official_jp), with Archer’s Midnight as its air taxi partner. This makes Archer the only U.S. eVTOL manufacturer set to play a key role in the establishment of air taxi services in Osaka. https://t.co/DiyAbGa9Mc
